column5: Ethan wanted to go down to the river for a bit so figured might as well bring the rod.Didn't see any fish jumping but some fish were hungry.  I had another one spit the hook at me that was about the same size.After that we took some pics and headed home.so 1 for 2 in a half hour was fine with me.
NIce. Good to see the Carp are still biting this late.
BEAUTIFUL MIRROR!!!  Congrats on your catch ... i have yet to catch one still.
I've yet to catch one of those elusive Mirrors myself.  Congratulations!  Nice to have the river so close that even when you have only a 1/2 hour, it's still worth your while to head down.
Well anytime you can get out to fish is worth it right !!!!!! and hey at least a few mirror carp were willing to play.....cheers
Cool patterns on that mirror carp.  Nice little surprise for sure
Can this guy catch'em or what! . Whistle away!!! The pied piper of Paris strikes again!!!!
Nice   You know that stretch of river like the back of your hand.
Those scales look nice on that carp not used to seeing a pattern like that.I think the fish are well fed in your back yard you never pose with skinny fish lol.  MTP
